name: Idle Dragons
description:
Build your team in Idle dragon and start to write a story about your adventure and conquest! You can discover and
know the myths and types of dragon. You can get stronger and more powerful dragons through merge!
A valley called Dragoncoo is growing vigorously, however the evil Zombiedragon appears, he attempts to push the beautiful
Dragoncoo into destruction. Many kind dragons start to feel disturbed, they start running and practicing,
hope to defeat the evil Zombiedragon!
But, they don't have a leader, they fight alone without clues. This is exactly what Zombiedragon wants to see!
Do you want to see the beautiful Dragoncoo move towards destruction? Dragoncoo needs you, so are the kind dragons. Come on now!
